description: {"blocks":[{"key":"afcqa","text":"This is the summary protocol for operating a commercial MIBI in the Bendall \u0026 Angelo Labs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kjpf","text":"Will be updated as new internal and external features are adopted.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dm3jg","text":"Unless actively navigating your tissue or slide, make sure to keep the MIBI Control in STANDBY mode (not SED or SPOT)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":87,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aeefm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o1mq","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eli1o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"974A1470EEB111EDA286AD549CD4EF19","height":325,"id":382308,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"mode.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmgbd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmebd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmfbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmdbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2v6t5","text":"Ensure the machine youâ€™re working on (P9, M13, M16) is currently UP on the machine status sheet and slack channel #mibi_instrument_status.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":75,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":20}],"data":{}},{"key":"ckb8l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11suu","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0AAD7E1EEB8F11EDAF590A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17oIV5iiDAAWRJENUNl_yBbrBZ3QPI09yKsFu3RTfRh8/edit#gid=1334684674"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"826F6570EEA011ED8605DFDC3E226DF9","height":108,"id":382312,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"5g790\",\"text\":\"\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"mibi_instrument_queue.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmkbd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmibd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmjbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmhbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d16ol","text":"NOTE: If you encounter an issue with your run and need to send a ticket to Ionpath (support@ionpath.com), make sure to update the sheet with the machine as DOWN and cc Mako (makogold@stanford.edu) \u0026 Christine (christinecamacho@stanford.edu) so they can sign the machine back to UP status after resetting the appropriate imaging settings once Ionpath has finished. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmd37","text":"Log into MIBI Control with your account (upper right hand corner of UI)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6drd5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akbna","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4q3vi","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pfqt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"862D6F20EEB111EDA286AD549CD4EF19","height":325,"id":382316,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"logon3.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmqbd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmnbd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmpbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmmbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a45f6","text":"Check available space on machineâ€™s D drive, named MIBIData (ensure there is at least 50GB on drive free for non-cohort runs)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pjav","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kbeg","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c7o9l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0EF76B20EE9F11ED8605DFDC3E226DF9","height":109,"id":382320,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"aquoc\",\"text\":\"\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Screenshot 2023-04-25 at 9.59.52 AM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmubd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmsbd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmtbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmrbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5u61","text":"If running a PMMA, you can use the instructions below with the PMMA slide assigned to each machine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m01t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9u6p8","text":"Load PMMA slide and move stage to a position close to previously imaged PMMA FoV.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37hj3","text":"Switch Mode to SED.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8bup","text":"Alter Detector Gain to see image.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h1pt","text":"MAKE SURE NO FOVS ARE LOADED AT THIS POINT OR CHECK WILL OVERWRITE.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10gkn","text":"Set up FOV - 512 x 512, 200um, 0.5 ms, 1 scan, Imaging mode: Coarse, Target: PMMA slide.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75upp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dc0tu","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2A3939A0EF5711EDBF8907A6297E58F1","height":514,"id":382324,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"add_PMMA_ex.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmybd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmwbd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmxbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmvbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9lrap","text":"One slide at a time - press Exchange Sample in MIBI Control, and confirm. Take the current slide out of the slot further from you and put your slide into the slot closest to you.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e49ap","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6d09l","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1o1iq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A53528E0EEB111EDA286AD549CD4EF19","height":325,"id":382328,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"exchange2.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxm4bd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxm2bd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxm3bd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxmzbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5439a","text":"Tiling / TMA Tool: Highly recommended for longer runs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18},{"style":"italic","offset":19,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hkb","text":"Tsai Lab tool for tiling on Optical or SED images","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":49}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":49}],"data":{}},{"key":"a9qc","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5iopg","text":"Further notes of use are here in the extended protocol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":25,"length":30}],"data":{}},{"key":"bsqvk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8470DCF0EEAF11EDA286AD549CD4EF19","url":"https://tsai.stanford.edu/research/mibi_tsai/index.php"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"92268980EEAF11EDA286AD549CD4EF19","height":256,"id":382332,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"ci33k\",\"text\":\"\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"albert_tiler_inset.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxm8bd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxm6bd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxm7bd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxm5bd44p.webp","width":550}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0FB4CF40EEC111EDA286AD549CD4EF19","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/tile-sed-array-interface-tsai-for-multiplexed-ion-4r3l27rrxg1y/v1?step=77.3"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dqahc","text":"You need to alter the focus and stigmation of your image before starting your run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jt3n","text":"Go to area of tissue not used for acquiring.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a7hb","text":"Switch Mode to SED, Imaging Mode to whatever setting you set your points to.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17vdn","text":"Starting with a large FOV, alter focus and stigmation until center is clear, top/bottom are slightly blurry, and repeat for smaller and smaller FOV windows (e.g. 400 and 100 um) at your acquisition resolution.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mvso","text":"Each time you finalize an FOVâ€™s focus settings, make sure you hit SAVE.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":71}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae0ph","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tjqb","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"12trc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4h6pu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejmog","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1B3AF7C0EF6811EDBF8907A6297E58F1","height":338,"id":382336,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"focus_stig_higlight.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxncbd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnabd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnbbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxm9bd44p.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cd22e","text":"The stigmation (angle, magnitude) is uniform throughout the slide.  The focus varies slightly along the y axis of the slide, i.e. the focus for a FOV towards the top of the slide will be slightly different than the focus for a FOV near the bottom of the slide. Therefore, focusing on tissue at the center of the slide is recommended for optimal image quality.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58lc3","text":"Load back FOVs from exported json file.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"g3kj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1sj3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"64266AF0EF6811EDBF8907A6297E58F1","height":47,"id":382340,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Screenshot 2023-05-02 at 3.29.31 PM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxngbd44p.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnebd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnfbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxndbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cpk2s","text":"Set the machine to STANDBY mode in MIBI Control.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5cr2k","text":"Run a single moly FoV to check general counts, should do this before every run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"267fp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdqgl","text":"Change â€˜Target Selectionâ€™ to select Molybdenum Foil.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4n14n","text":"Switch Mode to SED.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3h603","text":"Alter Detector Gain to see image.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86lmf","text":"MAKE SURE NO FOVS ARE LOADED AT THIS POINT OR CHECK WILL OVERWRITE.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lp1u","text":"Set up FOV - 128 x 128, 200um, 1 ms, 3 scans, Imaging mode: QC 100um, Target: Molybdenum Foil.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ht4h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68s7d","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D8A47E20EEBA11EDA286AD549CD4EF19","height":520,"id":382344,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"addFOV.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnkbd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnibd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnjbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnhbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bj5h7","text":"Individual Selection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42o9k","text":"Switch Mode to SED, Imaging Mode to QC 300.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fdol","text":"Click on area of slide and push â€˜Move Stage to Target Positionâ€™ button for large movements.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2jqq","text":"Use â€˜Jog Stageâ€™ popout for larger movements.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egetp","text":"Single arrow = single increment denoted by number in window.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fp8np","text":"Double arrow = 10x movement of number in window.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgd9f","text":"Triple arrow = 100x movement of number in window.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ndco","text":"After finding a spot, click on â€˜Add FOVâ€™.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1eqm","text":"Enter parameters: resolution, FOV size, dwell time, imaging mode, etc.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3t0p5","text":"Give the point a name and assign it to a slide / section.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29o6p","text":"Save.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hmf8","text":"Move to next point and repeat until all points a re selected.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65rti","text":"Export FOVs as a json file (will need to import later).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":55}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cr1eq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a63ep","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9s9iu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"226BF840EEA111ED8605DFDC3E226DF9","height":47,"id":382348,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"export_fov_inset.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnqbd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnnbd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnpbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnmbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42fkl","text":"Make sure Lens 1 voltage where it should be in HV Control Chrome tab: ~505V.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":77,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cak8u","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6fp0m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"91B45A00EE9F11ED8605DFDC3E226DF9","height":111,"id":382352,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"5jdoc\",\"text\":\"\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"lens1_hv_inset.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnubd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnsbd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxntbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnrbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ef87g","text":"DO NOT Change - talk to Mike, Marc, Christine, or Mako if it shows a different value.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":85}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ctjh1","text":"Make sure the slide loads properly; the image should load in the left window. Assign slide ID as created in Ionpath MIBItracker under your account.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":108,"length":19}],"data":{}},{"key":"fkuhl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"45q13","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"251B2E30EEAB11EDA286AD549CD4EF19","url":"https://angelolab.ionpath.com/tracker/login/"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cp0gl","text":"The panel and slide ID must be entered and linked in the Ionpath MIBItracker prior to sample exchange.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27uro","text":"NOTE: PMMA slide is used for checking counts distribution from channels we will actually extract from. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqo6l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3012m","text":"Ideal to run before loading a slide during cohort runs, ensuring signal distribution is normal. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6f845","text":"Do NOT do this between separate runs on the same slide, e.g. if setting up multiple runs on a single slide with a large TMA.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"esdfb","text":"Current check: confirm imaging mode current values match expected output.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7i7q2","text":"Detector Calibration: To maintain a consistent ion response, or image brightness, the detector gain is calibrated by measuring Molybdenum Foil counts over a range of gain settings. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tvii","text":"Molybdenum Foil check: confirm built-in, general counts acquired at a specific current.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0h7k","text":"PMMA check: confirm specific counts at mass ranges of interest at a specific current.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"l2s2","text":"Ionpath Quick start guide outlines more specific details as needed.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":8,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":17}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5EAF7013EEAA11EDA8C60A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://storage.googleapis.com/mibitracker-static/docs/MIBIscopeQuickStartGuide.pdf"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4gb3o","text":"Record values in log sheet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dj6o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rt1d","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D740EE4DEEBE11ED95A40A58A9FEAC02","height":194,"id":382356,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"molycounts_log.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mkz7bd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnwbd44p.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnvbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hbon","text":"Detector Calibration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8f024","text":"Press button, and MIBI Control will begin a detector sweep.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6nrd","text":"MAKE SURE NO FOVS ARE LOADED AT THIS POINT OR CHECK WILL OVERWRITE.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"boh6r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frf6r","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2i32","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B20F4280EEB111EDA286AD549CD4EF19","height":325,"id":382358,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"calibrate2.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxn2bd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnybd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnzbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxnxbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90n8r","text":"Check current values for consistency and accuracy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ti5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bsst4","text":"Change â€˜Target Selectionâ€™ to select Faraday cup.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9neb4","text":"Switch Mode to SED.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nhuv","text":"Alter Detector Gain to see image.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0jb4","text":"Turn on image crosshairs and use jog to center cross to the middle of the cup.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ruur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"delfv","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"g93","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FD281360EF6911EDBF8907A6297E58F1","height":327,"id":382362,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"faraday_cup_highlight.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxn6bd44p.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxn4bd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxn5bd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxn3bd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d27ip","text":"If values are NOT massively different from previously recorded values (i.e. 20% difference okay, ~log difference not okay) then pass.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69vmg","text":"If values are problematic, ask other lab members and/or Mike.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":61}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"buo2u","text":"If acquiring in Coarse mode: Change Mode to SPOT, Imaging mode to Coarse.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cm5n0","text":"Sample current - want around 9.5.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dhut","text":"Change Lens 1(V).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eb4co","text":"Record values in log sheet.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfs1a","text":"SAVE to Imaging Mode.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9bs7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1d33q","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bbj3o","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1o1em","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ttn5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4C31A020EF5611EDBF8907A6297E58F1","height":317,"id":382366,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"coarse_spot.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxpabd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxn8bd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxn9bd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxn7bd44p.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6qsl8","text":"The sample current (nA) and lens 1 (V) have an inverse relationship. To decrease the sample current, increase the lens voltage incrementally.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8dpcg","text":"If acquiring in Super Fine mode: Change Mode to SPOT, Imaging mode to Super Fine Imaging Mode.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apkbd","text":"Sample current - want around 2.5","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7kovr","text":"Change Lens 1(V).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0e2a","text":"Record value in log sheet.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vef1","text":"SAVE to Imaging Mode","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6n27t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eim3c","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2986f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"560E3130EF5611EDBF8907A6297E58F1","height":317,"id":382370,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"superfine_spot.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxpebd44p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxpcbd44p.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxpdbd44p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mxpbbd44p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dbn6n","text":"If values are NOT massively different from previously recorded values (i.e. 20% difference okay, ~log difference not okay) then pass.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7k7u0","text":"If values are problematic, ask other lab members and/or Mike.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":61}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f29q","text":"If running for longer than 24 hours:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atpb5","text":"- Monitor MPH, if below a certain value, detector gain will need to be boosted.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3015p","text":"- AutoGain will eventually handle this. TBD","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":40,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73c4e","text":"Start Run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg641","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rkvb","text":"Integrate Moly 98 and Moly 92 counts for the 3rd scan. {"blocks":[{"key":"3cgfl","text":"When done, put SED back into standby mode so you donâ€™t ablate your tissue sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f7sdk","text":"Start Run. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7bpd","text":"Observe first few points in GUI for channel dropouts, low counts, any focus issues.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"513r8","text":"If the calibration fails, up Detector voltage in HV control (bottom of page) and run again. If subsequent calibrations fail, then talk to Mike, Marc, Christine, or Mako.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":92,"length":77}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
